Author: thisaintheavymetal
Text: god, i know. even just a few months ago sometimes i would feel fat or whatever, but now i constantly body check myself (touch my collar bones, put my hands around my thighs, press on my ribs through my skin, etc) and 90% of the time my reflection is repulsive to me. it’s horrible. i can’t even wear a t-shirt if it makes me look even slightly larger than i actually am.
